sentences.en: a surgical face mask
sentences.cn: 外科手术口罩

sentences.en: Behind the mask of friendliness, I know he really dislikes me.
sentences.cn: 在友善的面具后面, 我知道他其实并不喜欢我.

sentences.en: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture.
sentences.cn: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

sentences.en: Diane lit a cigarette, trying to mask her agitation.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜点燃一根香烟，试图掩饰她的焦躁不安。

sentences.en: Dina lit a cigarette, trying to mask her agitation.
sentences.cn: 黛娜点燃了一支烟，试图掩饰她的不安。

sentences.en: He conceals his worries behind a mask of nonchalance.
sentences.cn: 他装作若无其事,借以掩饰内心的不安.

sentences.en: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.cn: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

sentences.en: He was squinting through the smoke that masked the enemy.
sentences.cn: 他眯眼看着遮住敌人的那片烟雾。

sentences.en: Her sarcasm is a mask for her insecurity.
sentences.cn: 她讽刺挖苦是为了掩饰她的不安全感。

sentences.en: I surprised everyone by wearing a terrible mask.
sentences.cn: 我带了一副可怕的面具,使大家受惊了.

sentences.en: Kate realized that the previous hard look on Maggie's face had been a mask.
sentences.cn: 凯特意识到玛吉原先的那副冷酷表情其实是装出来的。

sentences.en: Men often mask their true feelings with humour.
sentences.cn: 男人常常用幽默来掩饰他们真实的情感。

sentences.en: Men often mask their true feelings with humour..
sentences.cn: 男人常常用幽默来掩饰他们真实的情感。

sentences.en: The enemy mask their enmity under an appearance of friendliness.
sentences.cn: 敌人用友好的外表来掩饰内心的敌意.

sentences.en: The gunman, whose mask had slipped, fled.
sentences.cn: 面罩掉落的持枪歹徒逃之夭夭了。

sentences.en: The healthy trade figures mask a much gloomier picture.
sentences.cn: 繁荣的贸易数据背后掩盖着贸易极不景气的真相。

sentences.en: The jokes were a mask to hide his sadness.
sentences.cn: 玩笑是掩盖他内心悲伤的方式.

sentences.en: The mask is left on for about 15 minutes while it sets to a rubbery texture.
sentences.cn: 面膜敷上后等约15分钟，待其变成橡胶状质地。

sentences.en: The mask was so lifelike it was quite frightening.
sentences.cn: 该面具非常逼真以至看起来有点恐怖.

sentences.en: This mask leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 这种面膜能使你的皮肤变得柔软细嫩。

sentences.en: This perfume won't mask the unpleasant smell.
sentences.cn: 这种香水遮不住那股难闻的气味.

sentences.en: You must wear goggles and a mask that will protect you against the fumes.
sentences.cn: 为了免受烟雾危害，你必须戴上护目镜和面罩。

words.tran_cn: 戴面具；掩饰；使模糊（mask的过去分词）
戴面具；掩饰；化装（mask的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 医用口罩；手术口罩；外科医生的口罩
在…假面具下；假借…之名；假称；假托

trans.tran_en: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
to hide your feelings or the truth about a situation
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one
